PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-12712022-12-02,  ,  ,  FIN, 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectOrder Declaring that Subsections 89(1), (4) and (6) and section 89.1 of the Financial Administration Act Apply to the Canada Growth Fund Inc.
PrecisOrder declaring that SUBSECTIONS 89(1), (4) AND (6) AND SECTION 89.1 OF THE ACT, which apply only to parent Crown corporations, APPLY TO THE CANADA GROWTH FUND INC. in order to deem it to be a parent Crown corporation, even though it is a subsidiary Crown corporation, effective on the day on which it is incorporated.
AttachmentsAttachment
